      • addAssignment

        public void addAssignment(Variable v,
                 Term t)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds an assignment to this substitution.
        Parameters:
        v - the variable
        t - the term to assign
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if v is in keyset --> bad substitution, or if v appears in t --> substitution non well formed
